library(dygraphs)
library(xts)
library(xts)
library(ggplot2)

#project.id <- 'Alambic'
file.evol = paste("", project.id, "_git_commits.csv", sep="")
evol <- read.csv(file=file.evol, header=T)
evol$commits_sum <- cumsum(evol$commits)
evol$date_ext <- paste(evol$date, "-01", sep="")
#evol.xts <- xts(evol, as.POSIXct(as.character(evol[,c('date_ext')]), format="%Y-%m-%d"))
evol.xts <- xts(evol[,c('commits_sum')], as.POSIXct(as.character(evol[,c('date_ext')]), format="%Y-%m-%d"))

#evol.xts$value <- as.integer(evol.xts[,c('commits_sum')])
ggplot(data=evol.xts, aes(x=date_ext, y=value)) + geom_line()
ggplot(data=evol.xts, aes(x=, y=value)) + geom_line()

#evol.xts <- xts(evol, order.by = as.POSIXct(evol$unixtime, origin="1970-01-01"))
p <-dygraph(evol.xts[,c('commits')],
        main = paste('Commits for ', project.id, sep=''),
        width = 800, height = 250 ) %>%
      dyRangeSelector()
p
